title: United States
content: Born and raised here.

title: Bahamas
content: I visited here in 2000, and stayed at Atlantis resort

title: Aruba
content: I visited here in 2001. I remember the water being so clear I could see the fish from the beach

title: Canada
content: I visited here in 2001 and 2019. I was able to go on a train/bus tour through the Rockies

title: India
content: I've been here in 2002, 2005, 2007, 2011, 2017, and 2019. My grandparents live in Hyderabad, but I've been all over the country

title: Belize
content: I visited here in 2003. This was where I took my Flat Stanley

title: Panama
content: I visited here in 2004. I remember our taxi driver was the nicest guy ever and gave us a tour of the city and a wonderful home cooked meal made by his wife

title: Japan
content: I visited here in 2005. My cousin and uncle live near Kyoto, but we were also able to see Mt. Fuji on a totally clear day

title: Costa Rica
content: I visited here in 2006 and 2011. I got stuck in the inside of a tree trunk trying to climb inside of it

title: Mexico
content: I visited here in 2007. I remember this was the first time I went snorkeling.

title: Peru
content: I visited here in 2008. I told our boat driver at Lake Titicaca I was from Virginia and he asked if it was the land of virgins

title: Turks and Caicos
content: I visited here in 2008. This was the first place I tried a virgin pi√±a colada and proceeded to be my drink of choice the rest of the week

title: Antigua
content: I visited here in 2009. The resort had a ping pong table that I played at constantly

title: Italy
content: I visited here in 2009. Between everything in just Vatican city itself, there's too much to remember

title: St Lucia
content: I visited here in 2010. There was a giant slide about 30 feet out in the ocean that I was the first one to be able to climb

title: Turkey
content: I visited here in 2012. I fell in the springs of Pamukkale and a group of friendly Russians offered to help me find my family and help me get dry

title: St Maarten
content: I visited here in 2013. The beaches were absolutely beautiful

title: Bora Bora
content: I visited here in 2014. I was able to swim with black tip sharks in the ocean

title: Germany
content: I visited here in 2014 and 2019. In Berlin, the Memorial to the Murdered Jews was the most moving place I've ever visited

title: Austria
content: I visited here in 2014 and 2019. The Schoenbrunn Palace is beautiful and memorable, but the thing that stood out to me </br> was at the royal zoo how sad the orangutan looked in her small cage surrounded by people

title: Grenada
content: I visited here in 2015. My family friend was attending medical school there and it was one of the nicest campuses I'd seen

title: Chile
content: I visited here in 2016. I got to hike on a volcano

title: Argentina
content: I visited here in 2018. I did back to back to back 12 -> 16 ->24 mile hikes. My feet weren't the same for weeks

title: Denmark
content: I visited here in 2019. We did a boat tour of Copenhagen and my friend broke a seat on the boat

title: Czech Republic
content: I visited here in 2019. We went to oldest beer hall in Europe and the slices were very good

title: Hungary
content: I visited here in 2019. The bath houses were a very relaxing experience

title: Switzerland
content: I visited here in 2019. I went down the worlds longest alpine slide

title: Netherlands
content: I visited here in 2019. The Van Gogh museum was inspiring

title: France
content: I visited here in 2019. We were able to go to the Women's World cup game the the US won 13-0 over Thailand
